elesa balawegayak basil wata ekrok weddi mahinda balawegaya sathu thawath kandayam wisin mahinda gota ekka puluwan uwath,basil ekka nam kohethma nohakiya kiya samajaya thula thawamath mathayak pathurawamin atha.eheth ewani yamapalanayata wasidayaka mathayan samajagatha karana apa sahodara piris wisin methuma thula pawathina shakthimath sanwidhana shakthiya ha nopasubasna uthsahaya pilibandawa dewarak nowa dahas warak sitha baliya yuthuya.mahinda,goda,basil,namal sahodara saha puthra nosalena bandim mathin, sirisena + ranil = yamapalanaya meratin athunga damamin thani pakshayak lesin shakthimath janathawadi aanduwak bihi kara,ma sujatha mathru bhumiyata subhawadi anagathayak ek kirimata basil rajapaksha mathithuma ada karannawu dawantha karyabharyayata mage sthuthiya saha subha prarthana ek karami..!

ape jathika aanduwa karyakshama bawin katayuthu karanne nam, nisi paripalanayen yuthu nam, ape welandama duradarshi lesin regulasi wenne nam, ape milishiyawa sanwidhanathmaka bawen ha mana shikshanayen yuthu we nam, ape sampath ha mudal wichakshana lesin palanaya wenne nam, ape naya ganimata hakiyawa nawatha pihituwa gaththe nam, ape purawasiyan nidahas ha sathutin ekamuthuwen wasaya karanne nam, ewita pita ratawal apiwa usiganwa ape amanapayata lakwimata nowa ape mithrathwaya dina gannata piliweth hadanu atha.
